## AbstractDevice.deviceToScreen() method

Calculates the screen position from position of current frame buffer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deviceToScreen(val: number): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

val


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The position of current frame buffer in pixels


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

## Remarks

If current frame buffer is the back buffer, the value will be divided by the device pixel ratio.
